reviews.review_text: This Beach Shack is a big fraud. We showed him in the menu and ordered 8 canned juice which is 100 rs each. But he charged us 180 each. He tried to threaten us. So if you are at Candolim pls avoid this shack. No ambience no taste.

We went here two days when we stayed in Candolim beach. We initially checked few other shack before finally deciding to sit here.
The atmosphere was pretty chill and peaceful since it was the offseason.
Liked the service too, overall a good experience

Spent two days here. Brilliant spot to spend the day at the beach, food was lovely, great sea view and the sun lounges were really comfortable. Compare to the other beaches we went to in North Goa, this beach shack felt the most comfortable and secure. Gitu was really attentive but not in an annoying way, he just knew when we needed him, got rid of the sellers when it was getting too much and just left us relax and enjoy our time there. Spotty is really lucky to have him. If you fancy break from spicy food, I personally recommend any of the "sizzle" dish from the menu! Thank you Spotty & Gitu you made our time there really memorable.
